briefdescription.para: Callback function that is called when the action row is clicked.
Title is shown next to the icon.

Callback function that is called when a tooltip is required.
Sub-actions that are shown when hovering the action.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QIcon &icon, const QString &title, const QString &subtitle, const QString &tooltip, const ClickedCallback &clickedCallback)
